content.text: Hi, I'm John. I'm a farmer.
Hi, I'm Sarah. I sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends.
That's cool. What's your favorite part of your job?
I like helping people find their dream homes.
That's nice. I'm a farmer too. I love working outside and being in nature.
That sounds great. I like being outside too, but I don't get to spend as much time in nature as I'd like.
I understand. What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I like to go out with my friends, play video games, and watch movies.
That sounds like fun. I like to go hiking, cook, and read.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially a fan of historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I love historical fiction too! I'm reading a book about the American Revolution right now.
That sounds interesting. I'm currently reading a book about the Tudors.
The Tudors are really interesting. I'm a fan of Henry VIII.
Me too! He was a fascinating character.
He really was. I'm glad we could chat.
Me too. It was nice to meet you, Sarah.
